trends: There have been no other sightings in Arthur
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: my daughter saw a flash that looked like a explosion then took a fast picture with her cellphone camera didnt notice anything till we downloaded it to the computer
divs: Sighting Detailsmy daughter seen a flash of light then took out her camera phone and took a pic of it as they were drivin down hy 9 back to our house on hy 6...when she got home she show it to me and thats when we seen the object to the right of the pic....in the middle top is what she seen and took the pic of.she never even noticed the 4 lights to the right of the pic till it was re looked at...if you look to the left just above the hydro lines it looks like a gray craft....and the four lights to the right are visible to..........if you zoom in on the picture you can see what looks like maybe 20 or more crafts flyin all back to the 4 light object.....she took the pic through the window of the truck drivin down the road...you can see some dirt on the window but you can really tell what is dirt and what is crafts......they just kept drivin cuz they were to scared to stop the truck and get out
